tweet: BlissMessage is an iPhone app which lets you send free text messages from iPhone to iPhone and from the web to iPhone as well.
Had to reject pending 1.1 version due to an OS 3.1 issue. Submitted new version. Now off to Ibiza.
Version 1.1 is available at the App Store. New feature: Send your current location. Recipients can view your position on an integrated map.
PhoneGap officially allowed by Apple http://bit.ly/4rvkBB
Submitted version 2.0 to Apple. Keep fingers crossed. #iphone #iphoneapp
